GK16visa05cu:5: vyaṅgyabhedāt kāvyabhedasya uktatvād vyaṅgyasya ca vyañjanāvṛttigamyatvād vyañjanāṃ pṛcchati---atha keyamiti /
GK16visa05cu:31: yatra ca svaśabdenābhidhānaṃ tatra pratyuta doṣa eveti vakṣyāmaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:34: abhihitānvayavādibhiraṅgīkṛtā tātparyākhyā vṛttirapi saṃsargamātre parikṣīṇā na vyaṅghyabodhinī /
GK16visa05cu:38: nanu rasādirabhidhayaiva bodhyatām ityata āhana ca saṃketita iti /
GK16visa05cu:39: nanu vibhāvādibhireva rasādibhāvādiḥ saṃketita eva ityatrāhana hīti /
GK16visa05cu:40: tadaikyarūpyaṃ tatsvarūpatā, vibhāvādirhi nāyakādiḥ, rasaśca tadvyakteratyādiḥ /
GK16visa05cu:47: rasādirapi kathaṃ na saṃketita ityāśaṅkyāha---na ceti /
GK16visa05cu:50: yadi rasādeḥ saṃketitatvamucyate tat kiṃ vibhāvādivācakena śabdena ?
GK16visa05cu:53: svaśabdābhidhāne ca na tasya pratītiḥ kintu doṣa eva /
GK16visa05cu:54: svaśabdo hi rasaśabdaḥ, śṛṅgārādiśabdo vā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:55: “śṛṅgāraḥ sakhi ! mūrtimāniva madhau mugdho hariḥ kīḍatī“tyādau ca vibhāvādisāmagrayādeva tadvyañjakatvam na tu śṛṅgārādiśabdasya /
GK16visa05cu:63_0: yathā dhanurdharamuktena iṣuṇā pratisaṃhitamekaṃ lakṣyaṃ dīrgheṇa vegarūpavyāpāreṇa
GK16visa05cu:63_1: bhittvā apratisaṃhitaṃ lakṣyāntaramapi dīrgatarībhūtena tenaiva vegarūpavyāpāreṇa
GK16visa05cu:64: yacca tātparyavṛttireva vyaṅgyabodhikā iti dhvanikasya matam,
GK16visa05cu:66: so 'yamityabhidhaiva vyaṅgyabodhiketi yat kaiściduktaṃ tatra so 'yamityabhidhānarūpeṣorvyāpāra ivetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:69: ayamarthaḥ--yathā khalu dhanuṣmatā mukto bāṇa ekenaiva vegarūpavyāpāreṇa śatroḥ kavacādikamanekaṃ bhinatti,
GK16visa05cu:70: tathaika eva śabdasya vyāpāro yāvaduddeśyaṃ bodhayati /
GK16visa05cu:79: yacca dhvaniketi---tātparyavyatirekāditi---vyañjakatvasya vyañjanāyāstātparyātatiriktatvād asau naṃ dhvanirna vyañjanā,
GK16visa05cu:87: na tulayā dhṛtam; kvacinnirūddhaprasarīkṛtya vākyārthabodhanamātre vyavasthāpitam /
GK16visa05cu:89: tayorupari “śabdabuddhikarmaṇāṃ viramya vyāpārābhāvaḥ” iti vādibhireva pātanīyo daṇḍaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:95: kramaśo bodhe ca tatsattve viramya vyāpārabhāva ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:96: idaṃ ca dūṣaṇaṃ na ruciram; vyañjanāvādināpi kramaśo bodhāṅgīkāreṇa viramya vyāpārasvīkārāt /
GK16visa05cu:97: tātparyasattve vṛttibheda eva viramya vyāpāraḥ svīkriyate, na tu ekayā vṛttyā iti cenna /
GK16visa05cu:99: tasmāt kramaśo bodhena tātparyagrāhakābhāva eva tayorupari doṣaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:100: na ca phalameva tadgrāhakamiti vācyam; phalasya tātparyottarabhāvitvāt /
GK16visa05cu:101: kramaśo vyañjanayā bodhane tu vaktṛboddhavāyadivaiśiṣṭyameva tātparyagrāhakam /
GK16visa05cu:102: na caivaṃ tadgrāhitaṃ tadevaṃ tātparyaṃ dhvanikamate vṛttirastu,
GK16visa05cu:104: yathā vā “surabhimāṃsaṃ bhuṅkṣva “iti sugandhimāṃsatātparyake vākye dhenumāṃsavyañjanā /
GK16visa05cu:111: evaṃ ca kimiti lakṣaṇāpuyapāsyā ? dīrghadīrghatarābhidhāvyāpāreṇāpi tadarthabodhasiddheḥ /
GK16visa05cu:117: evaṃ ca yadi śabdaśruteranantaraṃ yāvānartho 'vagamyate tāvati śabdasyābhidhā eva vāyapāra iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:121: kimiti ca “brāhmaṇa ! putraste jātaḥ, kanyā te garbhiṇī” ityādāvapi harṣaśokādīnāmapi na vācyatvam /
GK16visa05cu:124: (vi, ja) nanu na aṅgīkāryaiva lakṣaṇā ityata āha---kimiti ceti /
GK16visa05cu:125: kanyeti---atra kanyā adattā; tasyā eva garbhe pituḥ śokāt /
GK16visa05cu:129: ayamarthaḥ--harṣādayo hi na kenāpi vācyatvenābhyupagamyante, yato 'mī vācyārthapratītyā na kiyante /
GK16visa05cu:134: tataśca kāvyaśabdānāṃ niratiśayasukhāsvādavyatirekeṇa pratipādyapratipādakayoḥ pravṛttyaupayikaprayojanānupalabdherniratiśayamukhāsvāda eva kāryatvenāvadhāryate /
GK16visa05cu:135: “yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārthaḥ” iti nyāyāt” iti /
GK16visa05cu:139: yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārthaḥ “iti jaiminivākyameva vyaṅgyabodhane tātparyākhyavṛttau pramāṇamiti mataṃ dūṣayitumutthāpayati---yatpunariti /
GK16visa05cu:144: tathā ca sukhāsvādakāraṇatā kāvyavākyasya vyaṅgyabodhadvāreṇaiva etadvākyasya vyaṅgyatātparyakatvāt /
GK16visa05cu:147: kāvyaprakāśe tu asya vākyasya bhinna evārthaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:148: tathā hi--“yatparo yatsādhyatātparyakaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdasya prāmāṇyaniyāmakor'thaḥ na tu siddhaṃśe tasya śabdasya prāmāṇyam“iti /
GK16visa05cu:150: “gāmabhyāja“ityatra sādhyāṃśo 'bhyājanaṃ prāmāṇyaniyāmakor'tho na tu siddhagavāṃśaḥ; yathā vā,
GK16visa05cu:156: “yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārthaḥ “iti vādino matamāśaṅkya dūṣayati---yatpunara iti /
GK16visa05cu:162: pratipādyo yaṃ prati vākyaṃ śrāvyate; pratipādakastasya śrāvayitā /
GK16visa05cu:164: tasmānniratiśayasukhāsvādarūpo rasādirūpor'thaḥ śabdasya tātparyaviṣayo jātaḥ kiṃ vṛttyantarakalpanayeti /
GK16visa05cu:165: yatpase yaduddeśyaprayuktaḥ; sa śabdārthaḥ śabdenāvaśyaṃ boddhavyaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:167: tatra praṣṭavyam-kimidaṃ tatparatvaṃ nāma, tadarthatvaṃ vā, tātparyavṛttyā tadvodhakatvaṃ vā ?
GK16visa05cu:169: dvitīye tu--keyaṃ tātparyākhyā vṛttiḥ, abhihitānvayavādibhiraṅgīkṛtā, tadanyā vā ?
GK16visa05cu:175: sa śabdārtha ityasya vākyasya tatparatvamarthaḥ tadeva tatparatvaṃ pṛcchati---kimidamiti /
GK16visa05cu:179: tadanyā vā iti tātparyākhyā vṛttiḥ saṃsargaṃ bodhayitvā vyaṅgyārthamapi bodhayatīti dhvanikena yaduktaṃ tacca prāgeva dūṣitam /
GK16visa05cu:182: “vyañjanā vā tātparyaṃ vā tannāma'; ityeva vivāda ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:188: nanvastu yugapadeva tātparyaśaktyā vibhāvādisaṃsargasya rasādeśca prakāśanam-iti cet ?
GK16visa05cu:191: sahabhāve ca kutaḥ savyetaraviṣāṇayoravi kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ ? paurvāparyaviparyayāt /
GK16visa05cu:195: nanu atiriktapadārtharūpā turīyā vūttirdhvanikena nocyate, kintu kḷptatātparyameva vyaṅgyabodhakam /
GK16visa05cu:200: rasaniṣpattirityatra rasasya jñānaniṣpattireva niṣpattiḥ svaprakāśasya svajñānābhinnatvāt /
GK16visa05cu:206: prakāśanamityanantaraṃ,“tathā sati viramyavyāpāro na bhaviṣyati“iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:210_0: “yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārthaḥ“iti nyāyamaṅgīkurvatāṃ vyañjanānaṅgīkāre vānīrakuñja
GK16visa05cu:210_1: ityādau guṇībhūtaḥ pratīyamānor'thaḥ prathamamavataran śabdasya tatparatvābhāvāt
GK16visa05cu:211: nanu tarhi bhaṭṭanayavat, “pīno devadatto divā na bhuṅkte /
GK16visa05cu:212: '; ityādau, “rātrau bhuṅkte'; ityādivadatrāpi vyaṅgyārthapratītau vākyaśeṣaṃ kalpatāmiti cenna /
GK16visa05cu:215: “gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ” ityādau taṭādyarthamātrabodhaviratāyā lakṣaṇāyāśca kutaḥ śītatvapāvanatvādivyaṅgyabodhakatā /
GK16visa05cu:234: nanu abhidhā lakṣaṇā ca dīrghatarībhūtaiva vyaṅgyārthaṃ bodhayatu, kutastayorvirāmaḥ?
GK16visa05cu:235: śabdasya viramyavyāpārastu bhavanmate vyaṅgyabodhana iva svīkārya ityato vaidharmyādeva vācyavyaṅgyabodhakavyāpārayorbhedaṃ sādhayati /
GK16visa05cu:246: bhinno 'bhidheyato vyaṅgya iti---yadyapi abhidhāvyañjanayoreva bhedaḥ pradarśanīyaḥ,
GK16visa05cu:247: tathāpi tadbhedapradarśanenaiva tadvodhakasyāpi bhedaḥ pradarśita ityāśayena itthamuktam /
GK16visa05cu:257: vācyārthasya vaiyākaraṇairvedyatayā, vyaṅgyārthasya ca sahṛdayairityevaṃ yathāsaṃkhyamanvayaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:258: vaiyākaraṇa hi padasya padavācyārthasya jñānamātre nipuṇāḥ, na tu vyaṅgyārthajñāne /
GK16visa05cu:261: ityādau kvacidvācye vidhirūpe niṣadharūpatayā, kvacit “niḥ śeṣacyutacandanam-” (62 pṛ.)
GK16visa05cu:270: vidhirūpe vācye jñāte sati niṣedhirūpatayā vyaṅgyo jñāyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:276: “gato 'stakarkaḥ” ityādau ca vācyor'tha eka eva pratīyate /
GK16visa05cu:285: vācyārthaḥ śabdoccāraṇamātreṇa vedyaḥ, eṣa tu tathāvidhapratibhānairmalyādineti nimittabhedaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:304: “kassa va ṇa hoi roso daṭṭhūṇapiāeṃ savvaṇaṃ aharaṃ /
GK16visa05cu:310: (vi, da) viṣayabhedaṃ darśayati---“kassa vā ṇa hoi'; iti /
GK16visa05cu:311: kasya vā na bhavati roṣo dṛṣṭvā priyāyāḥ savraṇamadharam ?
GK16visa05cu:314: upanāyakadaṣṭādharāṃ patnīṃ tarjayantaṃ prati nāyikāsakhyāḥ pratāraṇoktiriyam /
GK16visa05cu:315: he vāritavāme ! vārite sabhramarapadmāghrāṇe vāme pratikūle ityāpātataḥ /
GK16visa05cu:320: nāyikayā hi pratīyate iyaṃ pratārayatītyevaṃ vyaṅgyārthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:323: (lo, i) kassa vā ṇeti---vāritādarthād vāme pratikūlakāriṇi /
GK16visa05cu:326: na punaḥ parakāmukena'; iti vyaṅgyaṃ tu kāntaviṣayam /
GK16visa05cu:327: evaṃ boddhṛsvarūpādibhede 'pi yadi vācyavyaṅgyayorekatvaṃ tadā kvacidapi nīlapītādau narapuṅgavādau bhedo na syādityāśayaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:328: nanu gato 'stamarka ityādivākye prakaraṇādirūpajñāpakāntarasahāyenaiva bodhitasya kāntamabhisaretyādivyaṅgyārthasya kathaṃ śabdapramāṇabodhyatvam,
GK16visa05cu:330: iti cedatra kecidāhuḥ-yathā śabdabodhitasya kvacid vācyasyārthasya satyāsatyatvajijñāsāyāṃ satyatvamanumānaviṣaya iti śabdānumānapramāṇayorbhinnaviṣayatvam /
GK16visa05cu:331: vyaṅgyastu eva eva śabdapramāṇena prakaraṇādibodhya iti dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭānti kayorvaiṣamyam /
GK16visa05cu:333_1: śabdasya ekavyaṅgye prakaraṇadisāhāyyasyeti kartavyatārūpatayā śabdasyāṅgatvaṃ svāṅgasya
GK16visa05cu:334: iha ca yadyapi vākyārthasya pratītyanantaraṃ tasya satyāsatyatvajijñāsāyāṃ satyatvaṃ pramāṇāntareṇānumānenaiva bodhyate,
GK16visa05cu:335: tathāpi satyāsatyatvajijñāsātaḥ pūrvamupapannāyā vākyārthapramāyā apramābhāvāt śabdaikasamadhigamyatvācca na śabdaprāmāṇyavyākopaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:336: na hi cakṣurādinā pratītau satyāsatyatvapratyakṣaprāmāṇyaṃ vyākupyeta /
GK16visa05cu:342: na khalu etāvataiva vyaṅgyānāmabhidhālakṣaṇābodhyatvaṃ nāsti, api tu itaradhāpītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:349: (vi, dha) rasādibodhikā na lakṣaṇā nāpi abhidhā sambhavatītyāha--prāgasattvāditi /
GK16visa05cu:350: tatkāvyasthaśabdajanyo yo rasastasya śabdabodhānantarameva janyamānatvāt tatprāk tasyāsattvāt tatra tatkāvyasthaśabdasya śakterlakṣaṇāyā vā grahītumaśaktatvādityarthaḥ;
GK16visa05cu:352: nanu kāvyāt prathamamanubhūyamāno yo rasastanniṣṭhasāmānyadharmarūpayā sāmānyalakṣaṇayā upasthite bhāvinyapi rase śaktigraho 'stviti cenna /
GK16visa05cu:353: śaktyā lakṣaṇayā vā prāthamikarasabodhasyaiva tatsambhavāt prāk tasyānupasthitatvāt vibhāvādivācakaśabdānāṃtatra śaktigrahakatvābhāvāccetyapi bodhyam /
GK16visa05cu:357_0: kintu vibhāvādyabhidhānadvāraiva tatpratīterānubhāvikatvāt nanu iha kāvyasthāt śṛṅgārādiśabdājjñātasya
GK16visa05cu:362: trayāṇāmapi vyaṅgyānāṃ mukhyārthabādhavirahādapi na lakṣaṇā bodhiketi /
GK16visa05cu:368: yatra“gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ” ityādāvupāttaśabdārthānāṃ bubhūṣannevānvayo 'nupapattyā bādhyate tatraiva hi lakṣaṇāyāḥ praveśaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:372: nanu rase 'pi tātparyasattvāllakṣaṇāṃ vinā tadanirvāha eva mukhyārthabādha ucyata ityata āha--na hīti /
GK16visa05cu:373: yadi rasādiśabdāttasya prāgupasthitistadaiva tasya lakṣaṇayā bodhārthamuktarūpamukhyārthabādhanirvacanaṃ saiva tu netyarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:374: rasanātmako vyañjanātmako vyāpāro yasya, etādṛśarasād bhinna eva rasādipratipādya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:396: ityādau padārthānāmanvayakāla eva bādhapratibhāsādyanvayasya vidhurībhāvastadā tena padārthena jalamayādinā ākṣipto yastaṭādistena saṅgatiranvaya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:398: na punaḥ “śūnyaṃ vāsagṛham--” ityādau (22 pṛ.) mukhāyāthabādhaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:402: ityādau śūnyavāsagṛhādīnāṃ vilokanādyanvayābādhāt na rasalakṣaṇetyaha--na punariti /
GK16visa05cu:407: yadi ca “gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ” ityādau prayojanaṃ lakṣyaṃ syāt,
GK16visa05cu:409: tasyāpi ca lakṣyatayā prayojanāntaraṃ tasyāpi prayojanāntaramityanavasthāpātaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:415: ityādau yat śaityapāvanatvaṃ ca vyaṅgyamuktaṃ tīralakṣaṇānantaraṃ tatrāpi lakṣaṇaivāstu; kiṃ vyañjanayā ?
GK16visa05cu:418: mukhyārthatvaṃ bādhitatvaṃ ca syāditi---ubhayameva tu nāstīti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:424: avivakṣitavācye tu śītatvapāvanatvādirūpaṃ prayojanaṃ lakṣaṇīyamastitvatyāśaṅkyāha---yadi ceti /
GK16visa05cu:425: śabdo hi prathamaṃ mukhyamarthaṃ pratipādya tasya vākyārthānvayānupapattau tatsambandhinamarthaṃ lakṣayati /
GK16visa05cu:426: iha yadi tīrapratyayānantaraṃ bodhyaṃ prayojanaṃ lakṣayati tadā gaṅgāśabdasya tīraṃ mukhyor'thaḥ syāt /
GK16visa05cu:429: tasya tayā takṣyatayā aṅgīkāryasya prayojanāntaram, rūḍhiprayojanābhāve lakṣaṇāsambhāvādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:431: “anavasthā yā mūlakṣatikāriṇī“mūlaṃ hyatra tīraniṣṭasya pāvanatvasya ca pūrvapakṣeṇa lakṣyatvenāṅgīkāraḥ /
GK16visa05cu:434: na cāpi prayojanaviśiṣṭa eva tīre lakṣaṇā /
GK16visa05cu:436: nīlādisaṃvedanānantarameva hi jñātatāyā anuvyavasāyasya vā saṃbhavaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:440: nanu lakṣyārthabodhānantaraṃ yadi prayojane lakṣaṇā tadaivānavasthā;
GK16visa05cu:441: śītapāvane tīre ghoṣa ityevaṃ prayojanaviśiṣṭa eva lakṣaṇāstvityata āha---na cāpīti /
GK16visa05cu:442: tatra gaṅgātīre ghoṣa ityato 'dhikārthasya pratītiḥ prayojanamiti kāvyaprakāśakṛduktaṃ prayojanamanusandheyam /
GK16visa05cu:449_0: iti cet--lakṣaṇayā yatpāvanatvaviśiṣṭaṃ jñānaṃ janayitavyaṃ tatprayojanībhūtaṃ jñānaṃ
GK16visa05cu:449_1: ca tadeva paryavasitamityataḥ kāryakāraṇayorabhedāpattireva bījamiti sarvatra tu
GK16visa05cu:450: nīlādijñānaṃ vyavasāyarūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ, tatkāryaṃ tu jñātatā /
GK16visa05cu:451: naiyāyikānāṃ murāreśca mate 'nuvyavasāyaḥ tādṛśakāryakāraṇayośca kramotpattireva ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:456: iha caitadviśiṣṭameva taṭaṃ lakṣaṇā bodhayatu kiṃ vṛttyantareṇa ?
GK16visa05cu:458: gaṅgātādātmyapratītyā ca taṭasya daivasiddhameva śaityādiviśiṣṭatvamityāśaṅkyāha--na cāpīti---prayojanaviśiṣṭe 'pi lakṣaṇaityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:462: ābhāsatvena hetūnāṃ smṛtirna ca rasādidhīḥ // VisSd_5.4 //
GK16visa05cu:469: rasādīnāṃ ratyādīnāṃ vyaṅgyānāṃ bodhanakṣamaṃ bodhakāraṇaṃ nānumānamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:474: kintu śabdānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyatvena vyañjanayā śābdabodhaviṣayo ratyādirbhāvukairbhāvyamānaḥ svaprakāśānandamayatvena pariṇata āsvādyamāno rasaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:475: tasya ca vyaṅgyatvaṃ prapānakarasanyāyena, taccharīrapraviṣṭaratyādervā vyaṅgyatvāditi /
GK16visa05cu:476: tathā ca tādṛśarasasya hetūnāṃ ratyādikāryakāraṇasahakārirūpāṇāṃ vibhāvādānāmābhāsatvena nānumānaṃ nānumitirityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:477: tathā hi vibhāvādayaḥ sītādayo hetavo mutubarthadidṛkṣādisambandhena rāmādivṛttayaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:478: sādhyastūktarūpo rasaḥ kāvyaboddhaniṣṭha ityato hetūnāṃ viruddhatvamasiddhiśceti hetvābhāsatā /
GK16visa05cu:480: rasādibuddhiḥ smṛtirūpāpi netyāha--smṛtirna ca rasādidhīḥ iti /
GK16visa05cu:483: vastutastu svaprakāśānandarūpatvenaiva na smṛtiḥ; tasyā evaṃbhāvābhāvāt /
GK16visa05cu:486: evaṃ vyaṅgyasyāsya prācīnavedyatvaṃ nirasya mahimabhaṭṭena khalu rasavastvalaṅkāravyañjakānāṃ vākyānāmantarbhāvārthaṃ yadanumānaṃ darśitaṃ tattaddhetvābhāsadoṣeṇa vidhurīkṛtam /
GK16visa05cu:488: vyaktivivekakāreṇa hi--“yāpi vibhāvādibhyo rasādīnāṃ pratītiḥ sānumāna evāntarbhavitumarhati /
GK16visa05cu:490: te hi ratyādīnāṃ bhāvānāṃ kāraṇakāryasahakāribhūtāstānanumāpayanta eva rasādīnniṣpādayanti /
GK16visa05cu:491: ta eva pratīyamānā āsvādapadavī gatāḥ santo lasā ucyante,
GK16visa05cu:501: ta eva anumīyamānā ratyādaya eva punaḥ punaranuśīlanādāsvādyapadavīṃ gatāḥ santo jñānasambandhena sāmājikaniṣṭharasatāmāpadyanta ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:508: kintu vibhāvādibhireva ratyādirvyajyata ityave bhramo jāyata ityāha---yato 'yamadyāpīti /
GK16visa05cu:523: ādye na vivādaḥ, kintu “rāmādigataragādijñānaṃ rasasaṃjñayā nocyate 'smābhiḥ” ityeva viśeṣaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:528: ratyāderanumānaṃ vyañjanā ceti vivādo nāpātata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:529: tadaivātra vivādaḥ syād yadā rāmādigataratyādivyañjanaṃ mayā rasatvenoktasyāt,
GK16visa05cu:532: tataśca vyaṅgyaratyādireva sāmājikaratyādāvabhedenā'pyamāṇo rasanākhyavyāpāreṇāsvādyamāno rasa iti rasanirūpaṇaprastāvoktasiddhāntaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:533: sa eva dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ, tasyānumeyatvāsambhava ityāha---dvitīyastviti /
GK16visa05cu:545: “yatra yatraivaṃvidhānāṃ vibhāvānubhāvasāttvikasañcāriṇāmabhidhānamabhinayo vā tatra tatra śṛṅgārādirasāvirbhāvaḥ” iti sugrahaiva vyāptiḥ pakṣadharmatā ca /
GK16visa05cu:549: vyaktivivekakāreṇa sambandhaviśeṣaṇavibhāvādīnāṃ yathoktānandarūpasavyāpyatā pakṣadharmatā ca sādhyate,
GK16visa05cu:559: (lo, au) atra mahimabhaṭṭadarśitāṃ vyāptiṃ dūṣayitvā vyāptigrahaṇābhāvaṃ draḍhayati--yaccetyādi /
GK16visa05cu:570: arthāntarasya rasasyābhivyaktau āsvādane nibandhanakāraṇaṃ vo yuṣmākaṃ yā sāmagrīṣṭā saiva vibhāvādirūpā sāmagrī no 'smākaṃ mate gamakatvena anumāpakatvena sammateryarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:573: arthāntarābhivyaktau yā sāmagrī kāraṇam iṣṭā saivāsmākamanumitau liṅgamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:574: sāmagrībhāve 'pi hi vyaṅgyārthapratipattau yataḥ kutaścidapi yadeva tadeva pratīyate /
GK16visa05cu:576: tasya vyāptigrahaṇaṃ vinā ābhāsataiva syāditi bhavatāmapi vyāptigrahaṇaṃ vinā vyaṅgyajñānaṃ na sambhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:587: siṣādhayiṣitatvaṃ cātra icchāviṣayatvamātram, na tu anumitsitatvam, rase 'numityabhāvāt /
GK16visa05cu:590: vastutastu sāmājike sātrātkriyamāṇaḥ svaprakāśānando 'numīyata eva na,
GK16visa05cu:594: tathā jñātavibhāvādirūpā sāmagrī rasāboddhurjanasyāpyastīti vyabhicāraśceti bodhyam /
GK16visa05cu:602: yacca “mama dhammia--” ityādau (242 pṛ.) pratīyamānaṃ vastu /
GK16visa05cu:609: yatra vastuno 'laṅkārasya vā vyañjanā tatra vastvalaṅkārau anumānagamyau eveti naiyāyikamataṃ dūṣayitumutthāmapayati---yacceti /
GK16visa05cu:615: jalakelau śrīkṛṣṇena svīyakaradattajalena rādhikāmukhacandraṃ punaḥ purabhiṣicya svīyakareṇa pidhīyate ca mucyate ca /
GK16visa05cu:617: pidhāne rātrau virahiṇastasya prātaḥ kālabhramāt saṃghaṭanam,
GK16visa05cu:621: tatkarasya jalakelitaralatve kṛṣṇamukhasyaiva sicyamānatvasambhavena svamukhasya pidhānāyogāt /
GK16visa05cu:622: yad vā--rādhikāreṇa pidhānamocanayorapi jalasekadvārā kṛṣṇakaraprayojyatvāttaddvārā kṛṣṭakareṇaiva pidhānamocane /
GK16visa05cu:624: atra śloke mukhe candrarūpaṇam ādipadadvayāt ślokāntare alaṅkārāntaramityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:633: rādhikāmukhasya candratvasya vyaṅgyatvāccandradarśanādarśanābhāyāṃ hi rātrisadbhāvābhāvabuddhyā cakavākayorvighanasaṃghaṭane bhavataḥ /
GK16visa05cu:638: (vi, ha) tatra vasturūpaṃ vyaṅgyamupakramya tasyānumeyatāṃ ghaṭayati---tathā hīti /
GK16visa05cu:643: pakṣe parvatādau sapakṣe mahānasādau ca vipakṣe jalahradādau vvāvṛttatvam /
GK16visa05cu:644: liṅgād vyāpyād dhūmādeḥ liṅgini vyāpake vahnyādau /
GK16visa05cu:650: (vi, ka) liṅgyasya trirūpatā ca sādhyavyāptisattve eva sambhavatīti /
GK16visa05cu:656: (lo, u) atra prakṛte, “bhrama dhārmika'; ityādau bodhyār'tho vyaṅgyo bodhako vācyaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:658: tataśca bodhakor'tho liṅgam, bodhyaśca liṅgī, bodhakasya cārthasya pakṣasattvaṃ nibaddhameva /
GK16visa05cu:660: tasmādatra yadvācyārthālliṅgarūpālliṅgino vyaṅgyārthasyāvagamastadanumāna eva paryavasyati” iti /
GK16visa05cu:670: pakṣe godāvarītīranikuñjarūpe āśraye sāmarthyādavaseya iti na khalu sapakṣasattvavipakṣavyāvṛttatvābhāvaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:673: tanna, tathā hyatra “bhama ammia-” ityādau (242 pṛdṛ)
GK16visa05cu:674: gṛhe śvanivṛttyā vihitaṃ bhramaṇaṃ godāvarītīre siṃhopalabdherabhramaṇamanumāpayati” iti yadvaktavyaṃ tatrānaikāntiko hetuḥ /
GK16visa05cu:685: kuto na yuktamityāha--tathā hīti atra--gṛhe iti /
GK16visa05cu:686: ayamarthaḥ--yasya khalu bhīrorgṛhe śvanivṛttyā bhramaṇaṃ vihitaṃ sa kathaṃ saṃhopalabdhisthāne bhramiṣyati /
GK16visa05cu:689: bhīrorapi guroḥ prabhorvā nideśena priyānurāgeṇa vā gamanasya saṃbhavāt,
GK16visa05cu:690: puścalyā vacanaṃ prāmāṇikaṃ na veti saṃdigdhāsiddheśca /
GK16visa05cu:697: pakṣe godāvarītīre hetoḥ siṃhasattvasya sandehāt sāndigdhāsiddhirityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:702: kiñca ya khalu vīraḥ sparśādiśaṅkayā śuno bibheti sa saṃhasadbhāvasthānaṃ pratyuta mṛgayādikutūhalena gacchatīti darśanādviruddho bhramaṇarūpasādhyaviruddhasya sādhanāt /
GK16visa05cu:704: “jalakeli-” ityatra “ya ātmadarśanādarśanābhyāṃ cakravākavighaṭasaṃghaṭanakārī sa candra eva” ityanumitireveyamiti na vācyam,
GK16visa05cu:716: (lo, ḷ) uttrāsakaḥ--yasya karatāladānādinotrāsena pakṣiṇo na ghaṭante, tadabhāve ca saṃghaṭante /
GK16visa05cu:724: ābhāsamāna ābhāsau hetorupalabhyamāno vyabhicāraḥ kokatrāsakavṛttiḥ svadarśanādarśanarūpaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:735: tathā “dṛṣṭi he prativeśini ! kṣaṇamihāpyasmadgṛhe-” ityādau (250 pṛdṛ)
GK16visa05cu:742: (vi, cha) ślokāntarepi vyaṅgyāntarasyānumeyatāṃ hetorvyabhicāreṇa dūṣayitumāha--tathā yaddṛṣṭimiti /
GK16visa05cu:745: iyaṃ parakāmukopabhogecchāvatī nalagranthinā stanadāraṇasambhāvanāsattve 'pi strotogamane ekākipravṛttatvād iti /
GK16visa05cu:746: granthakṛtastu stanāghātastrotogamanayoḥ pṛthakkathane 'pa na pṛthak hetudvayam /
GK16visa05cu:770: tatkāle sannihatajanastu yadi na vyaṅgyaboddhā tadā tasyānumānamapi nāstītyatastatrāpi navivādaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:771: yadi tu vyaṅgyaboddhā tadā tṛtīyapakṣe evāntarbhāva ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:775: tadviraheṇektasya candanacyavanāderupabhogavyāpyatā nāstīti tatraiva vyabhicāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:777: (lo, o) na vivāda iti---na khalu vayaṃ dūtyāstatkalasannihitānāṃ vānumānaṃ nirākurmaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:781: nanu vaktrādyavasthāsahakṛtatvena viśeṣyo heturiti na vācyam /
GK16visa05cu:792: nanviti---vaktrī yādṛśīmavasthāṃ prāpya tathoktavatī sāvasthā hetorviśeṣaṇīkartavyetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:802: kiñcaivaṃvidhānāṃ kāvyānāṃ kavipratibhāmātrajanmanāṃ prāmāṇyānāvaśyakatvena saṃdigdhāsiddhatvaṃ hetoḥ /
GK16visa05cu:813: tena ca tatkāntasyādhamatvaṃ prāmāṇikaṃ na veti kathamanumānam /
GK16visa05cu:817: nanu vyabhicāriṇa sandigdhena vā candanacyavanādinā kathamupabhogasya bhavanmate vyañjanāpītyata āha---vyaktivādinā ceti /
GK16visa05cu:820: na hyanumāna iva vyañjanāyāmapi vyabhicārādikamaṅgamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:821: anumānapakṣe adhamasaninahitapreṣitatve satīti viśeṣaṇadānamapi na sambhavatītyāha---tena ceti /
GK16visa05cu:824: adhamatvasya prāmāṇikatvepi tasya dūtīgamanecchārāditye sati tāvatāpyanumānāsambhava ityapi bodhyam /
GK16visa05cu:840: yathā “yo jīvati sa kutrāpyavatiṣṭhate, jīvati cātra goṣṭhyāmavidyamānaścaitraḥ” ityādi /
GK16visa05cu:848: (lo, ī) yadi khalu pūrvaṃ jīvataḥ kutrāpi sthānamavagacchet /
GK16visa05cu:849: arthapattisvarūpaṃ hi--dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vā anyathā nopapadyate iti, tadarthakalpanamarthāpattiriti /
GK16visa05cu:851: pratyakṣānumānopamānārthāpattyabhāvalakṣaṇaḥ pañcabhiḥ pramāṇairupalabdhaḥ śabdasya ca prādhānyakhyāpanārthaṃ bhedena nirdiśati--śruta iti /
GK16visa05cu:852: śruta iti śabdalakṣaṇena jñātor'thor'thaviśeṣo 'nyathā nopapadyata iti /
GK16visa05cu:853: śābdī hyākāṅkṣā śabdenaiva prapūryata iti darśanāt /
GK16visa05cu:854: “pīno devadatto divā na bhuṅkte'; ityatra rātrau bhuṅkte iti vākyaśeṣaḥ kalpyate /
GK16visa05cu:857: tato lokaprasiddhyopalabdhimātre vartate, na tu vikalpapratipādana iti /
GK16visa05cu:858: śabdo hi kalpyater'thapratītyai viprakṛtasādhanaṃ tadvaram arthe eva kalpyatāmiti /
GK16visa05cu:866: jīvaṃścaitro 'tra goṣṭhyāṃ na vidyata ityatra kutrāpyavasthāne pūrvānubhavyāptimupajīvyaivārthāpatteḥ pravṛttiriti /
GK16visa05cu:876: sūcanā nāma kaścid vyāpāraḥ kaiściducyate tadgamya eva vyaṅgyārthaḥ iti mataṃ dūṣayitumāha---kiñceti /
GK16visa05cu:880: tathā ca yadyaṅgulitolanādau vyabhicāraśaṅkā na bhavati tatrānumānam /
GK16visa05cu:885: saṃketādilaukikapramāṇāsāpekṣatvenetyanena yatra yatrāṃ rdhvatarjanī tatra tatra daśaṃsakhyeti punargṛhītavyāptiruraskāravacanam /
GK16visa05cu:893: idaṃ cāpātata eva; sarvaṃśe saṃskārajanyatvasya hetokhyabhicārāt /
GK16visa05cu:894: kintu svaprakāśānandasvarūpasya rasasya smṛtītvāsambhava eva doṣaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:896: (lo, ū) smṛtirna ca rasādidhīḥ itikārikāpadārthaṃ viśadayati--yañceti /
GK16visa05cu:897: anaikāntikatvaṃ so 'yaṃ devadatta ityādijñānarūpāyāḥ pratyabhijñāyā api saṃskārajanyatvāt
GK16visa05cu:900: ca dvitāyārtho nāstyeva---iti yaduktaṃ mahimabhaṭaṭena tadanubhavasiddhimapalapato gajanimīlikaiva /
GK16visa05cu:904: dvitīyārtho maheśarūpo nāstyeveti---buddhiviṣayo nāstyevetyarthaḥ apalapata ityasya, upari, iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:908: gajanimīlikaiveti--paryālocanaṃ vināpi lokāpavādaśaṅkayā mattagajavaccakṣuṣī nimilya vacanamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:910_1: cānumānādipramāṇāvedyatayā cābhidhādivṛttitrayābodhyatayā ca turīyā vṛttirupāsyaiveti siddham /
GK16visa05cu:916: iyaṃ ca vyāptyādyanusandhānaṃ vināpi bhavatītyakhilaṃ nirmalam /
GK16visa05cu:920: na ca śabdasamarpitasya vibhāvāderjñānasyaiva rasāderjanakatvāt kāvyamatra sākṣānna hetutvena vyāpriyata iti vācyam;
GK16visa05cu:921_1: bhāvakatvāt yathā svārthasya jñānadvāreṇa tatsaṃsargaṃ bhāvayatāṃ padānāmeva karaṇatvābhāyupagamo
GK16visa05cu:922: kiñca sadvārakaraṇam iti nyāyenāntarālavartivyāpārāntaravirahādasambhāvyaṃ vibhāvādisaṃvalanajñānasyāsvādaṃ prati kāraṇatvam /
GK16visa05cu:923: nanvevaṃ vyāptyādyanusandhānamantareṇākasmād vācyārthasyāvagatau kathaṃ nātiprasaṅga ityāśaṅkyāha--iyaṃ ceti /
GK16visa05cu:928: rasavyaktau punarvṛttiṃ rasanākhyāṃ pare viduḥ // VisSd_5.5 //
GK16visa05cu:932: (vi, dha) rasavyañjanāyā rasanetyapi nāma kecidāhurityāha---rasavyaktau punariti /
GK16visa05cu:936: smṛtyupanayasahakāreṇa bodhanaṃ tu vyaṅgyārthasya pūvānubhavābhāvena smaraṇāsambhāvanayaiva nirastam /
GK16visa05cu:937: nahyuktānandarūpo raso dūtyādeḥ kāmukasambhogādirūpor'tho vā pūrvamanubhūtaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:944: iti sāhityadarpaṇalocane vyañjanāvyāpārasthāpano nāma pañcamaḥ paricchedaḥ
GK16visa05cu:946: iti sahityarpaṇo vyañjanāvyāpāranirūpaṇo nāma pañcamaḥ paricchedaḥ /
